metadata.name: Space After Filename - macOS
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to masquerade as legitimate files by adding a space to the end of the filename.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(' '))))

output.summary: Detects attempts to masquerade as legitimate files by adding a space to the end of the filename.

metadata.objective: False positive: Mistyped commands or legitimate binaries named to match the pattern Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1036.006/T1036.006.md
